synopsis.text:
Whatâ€™s the buzz about the enchanting rose from the Queen's garden? Well, it's no ordinary bloom; it possesses the power to grant wishes, both virtuous and wicked. When the young witch Pop stumbles upon this bewitching flower, she unknowingly sets off a chain of magical mayhem. After a heated disagreement with her sister Doremi, Pop's anger leads her to wish for Doremi to lose all her magical abilities and transform into a mouse. To their surprise, the wish comes true, and the magical rose sprouts legs, dashing off to cause chaos by granting wishes left and right.

Now, it's up to Pop, Hazuki, Onpu, and Aiko to band together and restore order. They must capture the mischievous Doremi and put an end to the rose's wish-granting rampage. Will they succeed in reversing the magical havoc and return everything back to normal? Join these young witches in their thrilling, hilarious, and heartwarming adventure to find out!
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
